Test Name: HLA Class II (DRB1, DRB345, DQA1, DQB1, DPA1, DPB1) Typing by DNA-PCR and Next Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To obtain precise and reliable HLA Class II allele typing for transplantation and other medical purposes.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, PCR thermocycler, NGS library preparation kit, sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), microcentrifuge, pipettes, vortex mixer, gel electrophoresis apparatus, computer with bioinformatics software
